26/**
27 * @fileoverview An HTML sanitizer that can satisfy a variety of security
28 * policies. The HTML sanitizer is built around a SAX parser and HTML element
29 * and attributes schemas.
30 *
31 * This package provides html sanitizing and parsing functions.
32 * {@code goog.string.htmlSanitize} is basically just using a custom written
33 * {@code goog.string.HtmlSaxHandler} that outputs safe html as the unsafe
34 * html content is parsed by {@code goog.string.HtmlParser}.
35 *
36 * Examples of usage of the static {@code goog.string.htmlSanitize}:
37 * <pre>
38 * var safeHtml = goog.string.html.htmlSanitize('<script src="xss.js" />');
39 * el.innerHTML = safeHtml;
40 * </pre>
41 *
42 * We use {@code goog.string.StringBuffer} for fast string concatenation, since
43 * htmlSanitize is relatively heavy considering that it is designed to parse
44 * large html files.
45 *
46 * @supported IE6, IE7, IE8, FF1.5, FF2, FF3, Chrome 4.0, Safari and Opera 10.
47 */
48
49goog.provide('goog.string.html.HtmlSanitizer');
50goog.provide('goog.string.html.HtmlSanitizer.AttributeType');
51goog.provide('goog.string.html.HtmlSanitizer.Attributes');
52goog.provide('goog.string.html.htmlSanitize');
53
54goog.require('goog.string.StringBuffer');
55goog.require('goog.string.html.HtmlParser');
56goog.require('goog.string.html.HtmlParser.EFlags');
57goog.require('goog.string.html.HtmlParser.Elements');
58goog.require('goog.string.html.HtmlSaxHandler');
59
60
61/**
62 * Strips unsafe tags and attributes from HTML.
63 *
64 * @param {string} htmlText The HTML text to sanitize.
65 * @param {function(string): string=} opt_urlPolicy A transform to apply to URL
66 * attribute values.
67 * @param {function(string): string=} opt_nmTokenPolicy A transform to apply to
68 * names, IDs, and classes.
69 * @return {string} A sanitized HTML, safe to be embedded on the page.
70 */
71goog.string.html.htmlSanitize = function(
72 htmlText, opt_urlPolicy, opt_nmTokenPolicy) {
73 var stringBuffer = new goog.string.StringBuffer();
74 var handler = new goog.string.html.HtmlSanitizer(
75 stringBuffer, opt_urlPolicy, opt_nmTokenPolicy);
76 var parser = new goog.string.html.HtmlParser();
77 parser.parse(handler, htmlText);
78 return stringBuffer.toString();
79};
80
81
82/**
83 * An implementation of the {@code goog.string.HtmlSaxHandler} interface that
84 * will take each of the html tags and sanitize it.
85 *
86 * @param {goog.string.StringBuffer} stringBuffer A string buffer, used to
87 * output the html as we sanitize it.
88 * @param {?function(string):string} opt_urlPolicy An optional function to be
89 * applied in URLs.
90 * @param {?function(string):string} opt_nmTokenPolicy An optional function to
91 * be applied in names.
92 * @constructor
93 * @extends {goog.string.html.HtmlSaxHandler}
94 */
95goog.string.html.HtmlSanitizer = function(
96 stringBuffer, opt_urlPolicy, opt_nmTokenPolicy) {
97 goog.string.html.HtmlSaxHandler.call(this);
98
99 /**
100 * The string buffer that holds the sanitized version of the html. Used
101 * during the parse time.
102 * @type {goog.string.StringBuffer}
103 * @private
104 */
105 this.stringBuffer_ = stringBuffer;
106
107 /**
108 * A stack that holds how the handler is being called.
109 * @type {Array}
110 * @private
111 */
112 this.stack_ = [];
113
114 /**
115 * Whether we are ignoring what is being processed or not.
116 * @type {boolean}
117 * @private
118 */
119 this.ignoring_ = false;
120
121 /**
122 * A function to be applied to urls found on the parsing process.
123 * @type {?function(string):string}
124 * @private
125 */
126 this.urlPolicy_ = opt_urlPolicy;
127
128 /**
129 * A function to be applied to names fround on the parsing process.
130 * @type {?function(string):string}
131 * @private
132 */
133 this.nmTokenPolicy_ = opt_nmTokenPolicy;
134};
135goog.inherits(
136 goog.string.html.HtmlSanitizer,
137 goog.string.html.HtmlSaxHandler);
138
139
140
141/**
142 * The HTML types the parser supports.
143 * @enum {number}
144 */
145goog.string.html.HtmlSanitizer.AttributeType = {
146 NONE: 0,
147 URI: 1,
148 URI_FRAGMENT: 11,
149 SCRIPT: 2,
150 STYLE: 3,
151 ID: 4,
152 IDREF: 5,
153 IDREFS: 6,
154 GLOBAL_NAME: 7,
155 LOCAL_NAME: 8,
156 CLASSES: 9,
157 FRAME_TARGET: 10
158};

390
391
392/**
393 * @override
394 */
395goog.string.html.HtmlSanitizer.prototype.startTag =
396 function(tagName, attribs) {
397 if (this.ignoring_) {
398 return;
399 }
400 if (!goog.string.html.HtmlParser.Elements.hasOwnProperty(tagName)) {
401 return;
402 }
403 var eflags = goog.string.html.HtmlParser.Elements[tagName];
404 if (eflags & goog.string.html.HtmlParser.EFlags.FOLDABLE) {
405 return;
406 } else if (eflags & goog.string.html.HtmlParser.EFlags.UNSAFE) {
407 this.ignoring_ = !(eflags & goog.string.html.HtmlParser.EFlags.EMPTY);
408 return;
409 }
410 attribs = this.sanitizeAttributes_(tagName, attribs);
411 if (attribs) {
412 if (!(eflags & goog.string.html.HtmlParser.EFlags.EMPTY)) {
413 this.stack_.push(tagName);
414 }
415
416 this.stringBuffer_.append('<', tagName);
417 for (var i = 0, n = attribs.length; i < n; i += 2) {
418 var attribName = attribs[i],
419 value = attribs[i + 1];
420 if (value !== null && value !== void 0) {
421 this.stringBuffer_.append(' ', attribName, '="',
422 this.escapeAttrib_(value), '"');
423 }
424 }
425 this.stringBuffer_.append('>');
426 }
427};
428
429
430/**
431 * @override
432 */
433goog.string.html.HtmlSanitizer.prototype.endTag = function(tagName) {
434 if (this.ignoring_) {
435 this.ignoring_ = false;
436 return;
437 }
438 if (!goog.string.html.HtmlParser.Elements.hasOwnProperty(tagName)) {
439 return;
440 }
441 var eflags = goog.string.html.HtmlParser.Elements[tagName];
442 if (!(eflags & (goog.string.html.HtmlParser.EFlags.UNSAFE |
443 goog.string.html.HtmlParser.EFlags.EMPTY |
444 goog.string.html.HtmlParser.EFlags.FOLDABLE))) {
445 var index;
446 if (eflags & goog.string.html.HtmlParser.EFlags.OPTIONAL_ENDTAG) {
447 for (index = this.stack_.length; --index >= 0;) {
448 var stackEl = this.stack_[index];
449 if (stackEl === tagName) {
450 break;
451 }
452 if (!(goog.string.html.HtmlParser.Elements[stackEl] &
453 goog.string.html.HtmlParser.EFlags.OPTIONAL_ENDTAG)) {
454 // Don't pop non optional end tags looking for a match.
455 return;
456 }
457 }
458 } else {
459 for (index = this.stack_.length; --index >= 0;) {
460 if (this.stack_[index] === tagName) {
461 break;
462 }
463 }
464 }
465 if (index < 0) { return; } // Not opened.
466 for (var i = this.stack_.length; --i > index;) {
467 var stackEl = this.stack_[i];
468 if (!(goog.string.html.HtmlParser.Elements[stackEl] &
469 goog.string.html.HtmlParser.EFlags.OPTIONAL_ENDTAG)) {
470 this.stringBuffer_.append('</', stackEl, '>');
471 }
472 }
473 this.stack_.length = index;
474 this.stringBuffer_.append('</', tagName, '>');
475 }
476};
477
478
479/**
480 * @override
481 */
482goog.string.html.HtmlSanitizer.prototype.pcdata = function(text) {
483 if (!this.ignoring_) {
484 this.stringBuffer_.append(text);
485 }
486};
487
488
489/**
490 * @override
491 */
492goog.string.html.HtmlSanitizer.prototype.rcdata = function(text) {
493 if (!this.ignoring_) {
494 this.stringBuffer_.append(text);
495 }
496};
497
498
499/**
500 * @override
501 */
502goog.string.html.HtmlSanitizer.prototype.cdata = function(text) {
503 if (!this.ignoring_) {
504 this.stringBuffer_.append(text);
505 }
506};
507
508
509/**
510 * @override
511 */
512goog.string.html.HtmlSanitizer.prototype.startDoc = function() {
513 this.stack_ = [];
514 this.ignoring_ = false;
515};
516
517
518/**
519 * @override
520 */
521goog.string.html.HtmlSanitizer.prototype.endDoc = function() {
522 for (var i = this.stack_.length; --i >= 0;) {
523 this.stringBuffer_.append('</', this.stack_[i], '>');
524 }
525 this.stack_.length = 0;
526};
527
528
529/**
530 * Escapes HTML special characters in attribute values as HTML entities.
531 *
532 * TODO(user): use {@code goog.string.htmlEscape} instead ?
533 * @param {string} s The string to be escaped.
534 * @return {string} An escaped version of {@code s}.
535 * @private
536 */
537goog.string.html.HtmlSanitizer.prototype.escapeAttrib_ = function(s) {
538 // Escaping '=' defangs many UTF-7 and SGML short-tag attacks.
539 return s.replace(goog.string.html.HtmlParser.AMP_RE_, '&amp;').
540 replace(goog.string.html.HtmlParser.LT_RE_, '&lt;').
541 replace(goog.string.html.HtmlParser.GT_RE_, '&gt;').
542 replace(goog.string.html.HtmlParser.QUOTE_RE_, '&#34;').
543 replace(goog.string.html.HtmlParser.EQUALS_RE_, '&#61;');
544};
545
546
547/**
548 * Sanitizes attributes found on html entities.
549 * @param {string} tagName The name of the tag in which the {@code attribs} were
550 * found.
551 * @param {Array.<?string>} attribs An array of attributes.
552 * @return {Array.<?string>} A sanitized version of the {@code attribs}.
553 * @private
554 */
555goog.string.html.HtmlSanitizer.prototype.sanitizeAttributes_ =
556 function(tagName, attribs) {
557 for (var i = 0; i < attribs.length; i += 2) {
558 var attribName = attribs[i];
559 var value = attribs[i + 1];
560 var atype = null, attribKey;
561 if ((attribKey = tagName + '::' + attribName,
562 goog.string.html.HtmlSanitizer.Attributes.hasOwnProperty(attribKey)) ||
563 (attribKey = '*::' + attribName,
564 goog.string.html.HtmlSanitizer.Attributes.hasOwnProperty(attribKey))) {
565 atype = goog.string.html.HtmlSanitizer.Attributes[attribKey];
566 }
567 if (atype !== null) {
568 switch (atype) {
569 case 0: break;
570 case goog.string.html.HtmlSanitizer.AttributeType.SCRIPT:
571 case goog.string.html.HtmlSanitizer.AttributeType.STYLE:
572 value = null;
573 break;
574 case goog.string.html.HtmlSanitizer.AttributeType.ID:
575 case goog.string.html.HtmlSanitizer.AttributeType.IDREF:
576 case goog.string.html.HtmlSanitizer.AttributeType.IDREFS:
577 case goog.string.html.HtmlSanitizer.AttributeType.GLOBAL_NAME:
578 case goog.string.html.HtmlSanitizer.AttributeType.LOCAL_NAME:
579 case goog.string.html.HtmlSanitizer.AttributeType.CLASSES:
580 value = this.nmTokenPolicy_ ?
581 this.nmTokenPolicy_(/** @type {string} */ (value)) : value;
582 break;
583 case goog.string.html.HtmlSanitizer.AttributeType.URI:
584 value = this.urlPolicy_ && this.urlPolicy_(
585 /** @type {string} */ (value));
586 break;
587 case goog.string.html.HtmlSanitizer.AttributeType.URI_FRAGMENT:
588 if (value && '#' === value.charAt(0)) {
589 value = this.nmTokenPolicy_ ? this.nmTokenPolicy_(value) : value;
590 if (value) { value = '#' + value; }
591 } else {
592 value = null;
593 }
594 break;
595 default:
596 value = null;
597 break;
598 }
599 } else {
600 value = null;
601 }
602 attribs[i + 1] = value;
603 }
604 return attribs;
605};

Overview

Generated by dossier
